title: Charlie Kirk memorial: Trump arrives in Arizona as tens of thousands attend service - latest updates
summary: U.S. President is set to address an event in Glendale, Arizona, attracting notable right-wing figures such as Steve Bannon and Elon Musk. The gathering highlights the increasing alignment among prominent conservatives. Key discussions are anticipated surrounding political strategies and ideologies.

title: What role has Britain played in the history of Israel and Palestine?
summary: In the early to mid-1900s, British politicians were instrumental in the establishment of the Israeli state, significantly influencing geopolitical dynamics in the region. Their involvement contributed to the displacement of many Palestinians. This period marked a pivotal point in the historical tensions between Israelis and Palestinians.

title: Arsenal 1-1 Manchester City: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a last-minute equalizer, nullifying Erling Haaland's stunning goal. This late strike prevented Manchester City from securing an away victory. The match ended in a dramatic draw.

title: Lando Norris defiant after failing to take advantage of Piastri’s Azerbaijan crash
summary: Lando Norris finished seventh in the Baku race following Oscar Piastri's early exit. He expressed that he is giving his best performance and doesn't concern himself with others' opinions. Norris remains focused on his own efforts and results.

title: Arsenal 1-1 Manchester City: Premier League player ratings
summary: Eberechi Eze and Gabriel Martinelli shine as substitutes for Arsenal in their recent match. Meanwhile, Erling Haaland stands out as the game's top performer. Their contributions highlight the depth of talent in the teams.
